# ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.horizontalPlane

**Case**

A goal that specifies your app requires a horizontal plane.

## Declaration

```swift
case horizontalPlane
```

## Discussion

When you use this goal, coaching overlay won’t hide until the user has moved their device in a way that facilitates ARKit finding at least one horizontal surface.

## Defining a Goal

- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.anyPlane**: A goal that specifies your app requires a plane of any type.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.tracking**: A goal that specifies your app requires basic world tracking.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.verticalPlane**: A goal that specifies your app requires a vertical plane.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.geoTracking**: A goal that specifies your app requires a precise geographic location.
